testcase.classname: Checking the Add user functionality in the application
testcase.name: Check Add user functionality with required detail
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Login page.................................................passed When user is logging successfully and goto homepage page....................passed And user is click on Admin button...........................................passed And user is click on Add button.............................................passed And user selects the User Role..............................................passed And user selects the Employee Name..........................................passed And user enters username in the username text field.........................passed And user selects the Status.................................................passed And user enters Password in the password text field.........................passed And user enters Confirm Password in the confirm password text field.........passed And user clicks on the SAVE button..........................................passed Then user successfully added the user.......................................passed

testcase.classname: Check the ForgetPassword functionality of the application
testcase.name: Checking the ForgetPassword functionality click on the link
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Login page.................................................passed When user clicks on the forget password link................................passed Then user is redirecting to the ForgetPassword page.........................passed

testcase.classname: Checking Login functionality of the application
testcase.name: Checking Login functionality with the valid login credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Login page.................................................passed When user enters username in the username textfield.........................passed When user enters password in the password textfield.........................passed When user clicks on the Login button........................................passed Then user is on Homepage....................................................passed

testcase.classname: Checking Logout functionality of the application
testcase.name: Checking the Logout functionality
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Login page.................................................passed When user is logging successfully and goto homepage page....................passed And user is click on Welcome user button....................................passed Then user clicks on the Logout button.......................................passed

testcase.classname: Checking the search add user functionality in the application
testcase.name: Check the search add user functionality with required detail
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Login page.................................................passed When user is logging successfully and goto homepage page....................passed And user is click on Admin button...........................................passed And user enters Username in the Username text field for search..............passed Then user clicks on the Search button.......................................passed
